DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective of this study is to evaluate the long-term tolerability and safety of natalizumab when administered a dose of 300 mg intravenously (IV) to subjects with Crohn's Disease who have previously participated in studies CD251, CD301, CD303, CD306, or CD307.
DOC.brief_title: Open Label Natalizumab Safety Extension Study for Subjects With Crohn's Disease
DOC.criteria: Male and Female Subjects 18 years and older with Crohn's Disease who have participated in studies CD251, CD301, CD303, CD306, or CD307 per protocol
